sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' import { BtnWrap, Column1, Column2, Heading, InfoContainer, InfoRow, InfoWrapper, Subtitle, TextWrapper, TopLine, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoElements' import imageOne from '../../images/img-1.png' const Info = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headLine, darkText, description, buttonLabel, alt}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default Info
